BenefitAssignmentAsset.name: BenefitAssignmentAsset
BenefitAssignmentAsset.description: Represents a junction between an asset and a benefit assignment.

AssetId.description: The asset related to the benefit assignment asset.

BenefitAssignmentId.description: The benefit assignment related to the benefit assignment asset.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date until which the asset is assigned to the benefit.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from which the asset is assigned to the benefit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the benefit assignment asset.
